name: Ubisoft
description: A major French video game publisher and developer.

name: EA
description: An American video game company known for sports games.

name: Activision
description: An American video game publisher known for Call of Duty.

name: Nintendo
description: A Japanese video game company known for Super Mario.

name: Sony
description: A Japanese video game company known for PlayStation.

name: Illusion Softworks
description: Illusion Softworks was established in 1997 in Brno by Petr Vochozka and Jan Kudera.[2] The company succeeded Vochozka's video game publisher, Vochozka Trading, through funding provided by Kudera's Cash Reform fund. The team initially comprised only five people, including Vochozka and Kudera. The team would expand to 40 people by the release of Mafia in 2002.
